Our Mission Our Goal Our Vision play Our Mentor ABOUT US www.robotixnitrr.org TRANSPORTS
We at Robotix Club, invovle ourselves in various activities ranging from lectures to workshops and competitions. Our mission is to make robotics an everyday phenomenon and spread the knowledge about it.
""
Robotics today is a field where a lot is happening. Not many things can be compared by a human brain. With a vision of involving as many students as it can, in various activities relating to a robot development, we continue to grow.
Click to see new Workshops
The ultimate goal of Robotix Club NIT Raipur is to educate maximum number of students. Create a hype of robotics. We want to participate in as many competitions as we can and keep learining all the while.
